thread.title: Watch: Alia Bhatt sweating it out to her favourite track!
thread.title_full: Watch: Alia Bhatt sweating it out to her favourite track!

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Alia Bhatt sweating it out to her favourite track!
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 13.37 pm Mumbai: Apart from working hard for the promotions of her upcoming film ‘Shaandaar’, Alia Bhatt is also sweating it out in the gym.
The actress, who is all set to flaunt her perfectly toned body in a bikini in ‘Shaandaar’, plans on following her workout routine very seriously.
In a recently shared video by the star, we see Alia breaking a sweat by doing the Ferris wheel on Cadillac to her favourite tune. Talk about having a perfect morning!
The Ferris wheel on the Cadillac to my current fav song ;) perfect mornings !!! #WORKOUT #bur @yasminkarachiwala #bodyimage
A video posted by Alia (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 5, 2015 at 10:31pm PDT
On work front, we'll soon see Alia in filmmaker Vikas Bahl's much awaited flim ‘Shaandaar’ alongside Shahid Kapoor. The film has already attracted a lot of attention with its trailer and grooving songs. ‘Shaandaar’ is all set to hit the theatres on October 22, 2015.
